# Stimulant Wiki — The Complete Stimulant Encyclopedia

> Free open encyclopedia of stimulants, nootropics, and cognitive enhancers. 26+ entries with mechanisms, dosing, safety, stacking guides, and comparison tables.


Stimulant Wiki is the internet's most comprehensive free encyclopedia on stimulants, nootropics, and cognitive enhancers. It covers prescription stimulants (Adderall, Vyvanse, Ritalin, Modafinil), natural nootropics (Alpha-GPC, Citicoline, Creatine, Lion's Mane), herbal adaptogens (Rhodiola, Ashwagandha, Bacopa), stimulants (Caffeine, Nicotine, Theacrine), nootropic stacks, and neuroscience mechanisms. Each entry includes how it works, dosing, side effects, legal status, safety rating, and where to buy. Features comparison tables, curated stacks for different goals, and in-depth guides.


## Pages

- [Homepage — Browse 26+ wiki entries on stimulants and nootropics](https://stimulant.wiki)
- [Encyclopedia — Full database of stimulants, nootropics, herbs, and stacks](https://stimulant.wiki#entries)
- [Comparison Table — Side-by-side comparison of 10 popular cognitive enhancers](https://stimulant.wiki#compare)
- [Stacks — 6 curated nootropic stacks for focus, memory, stress, motivation, sleep](https://stimulant.wiki#stacks)
- [Guides — In-depth articles on mechanisms, safety, and optimization](https://stimulant.wiki#guides)


## Keywords

nootropics, stimulants, cognitive enhancers, nootropic stacks, brain supplements, ADHD alternatives, modafinil, caffeine
